channel.title: Textbox'd
channel.description:
Here's the fruit of this evenings JavaScript adventure... http://www.sparkware.net/~jonny/code/TextBox/ It grabs the computed style of the

and inserts a textbox with that size and the text of the

, then allows you to save the changes back into the

, removing the textbox...Of course it needs some AJAX to make the changes stick, but I cba to do it right now. If you are smart enough to get the js code, then by all means, leech the fuck out of it, if not, gtfo back to moparscape. Good night.
